Twister/Blizzard


Twister: We'll never know until we try!

*Twister says t=
o Sinesis*

Twister: Which way to his base?

*Twister asks Sinesis*




*Bl=
izzard holds Sinister's hand starts walking towards the Maximal Base*

  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Saturday, August 05, 2000 6:48 PM
  Subject: Re: The End is Near.......=
....


  "Partner's!" Sinesis says. He starts to think.

  "Think Rampage w=
ill want us on his side?" Sinesis asks Twister.

  Sinister starts toward t=
he Maximal base while holding Blizzard's hand...
    ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sa=
turday, August 05, 2000 6:38 PM
    Subject: Re: The End is Near...........=



    Blizzard/Twister


    *Blizzard sighs and keeps walking but looks b=
ehind her and than doesn't anymore*



    Twister: Your right. It's not li=
ke she was going to let me stay anyway.

    *Twister stands up*

    Twist=
er: I think we start looking now. The sooner the better. Partners?

    *Tw=
ister says to Sinesis while holding her fist out for him to hit his on*

  =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:33 PM
      Subject: Re: =
The End is Near...........


      Sinister listens carefully to the words =
of Blizzard.

      "Who needs a home, Twister!? Let's just go find another=
 team that wants us and we shall be on our way to glory!" Sinesis said to T=
wister...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizar=
ds 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000=
 6:02 AM
        Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


        Blizzard=
/Twister


        *Blizzard begins walking*

        Blizzard:..Who am I k=
idding...I don't know what to do, I probably eat myself!

        *Blizzard=
 says sadly*

        Blizzard: It seems the the whole world is against me =
accept for you. Even my sister. I know the way she was acting, not normal.
=

        *Blizzard says to Sinister and sighs and continues walking*



   =
     *Twister looks at Sinesis*

        Twister: It was up to me tell the =
others too but I didn't because I didn't do it before I tried to stop Retro=
flame and I didn't after because I was too concerned with saving myself....=
That was the past and the future can be different but it isn't looking up n=
ow that we have no home...

        *Twister says to Sinesis

          ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:51 AM
          Subj=
ect: Re: The End is Near...........


          "Okay." Sinister said lamel=
y. He walked off with Blizzard whenever Blizzard walks off.

          Sine=
sis sighs.
           
          "I always said I never made any mistakes. =
That I was perfect, but once, I was supposed to fight some criminals that h=
ad a bounty on them, but I was not to harm anyone else. I killed that crimi=
nal for my own selfish needs, but he had a time bomb set. I thoguht I could=
 disarm it, but all I did was set the time even lower, and some bots didn't=
 have time to get away. I managed to get away since I knew about it, but I =
never told them, so that's why I chose the evil path in life, I felt I had =
done something evil..." Sinesis said...
            ----- Original Message =
----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
            Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:24 AM
            Subject:=
 Re: The End is Near...........


            Twister/Blizzard


          =
  Twister: I was sent on a mission to stop another bot named Retroflame. Sh=
e planed to blow up some other bots that didn't know a thing because she cl=
aimed that they were in her way. I was given no partners for there were non=
e to give. I didn't stop them....I tried but I was shelfish and excaped in =
a pod thinking of only myself and other bots were killed not only because o=
f Retroflame but also because of me....I deserved to be near that bomb.....=
There were missions before that but I wish not speak of for I have failed t=
oo many.......I wouldn't kill myself for I would probably be sent back down=
 for the Matrix would not want my selfish kind in.......

            *Twis=
ter says to Sinesis*


            *Blizzard sighs and looks up again still=
 frowning*

            Blizzard: We need to find shelter, my love.

      =
      *Blizzard says to Sinister*

              ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
          Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:30 AM
              Subject: Re=
: The End is Near...........


              Sinesis walks to Twister.

   =
           "A failure? When were you a failure? Tell me of one of your adve=
ntures on Cybertron that was a failure." Sinesis said. Sinister shook his h=
ead.

              "Unbelievable." Sinister said. Stronghold and Blender l=
ook at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa and Dracona's misfortune and tak=
e a smoke, then walk off to find another side to join, all the time hoping =
that Artist suffers and hoping that Twister really is and always will be a =
failure...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                Fr=
om: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              =
  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:22 AM
                Subject: Re: The =
End is Near...........


                Twister/Blizzard


               =
 *Twister looks at what was left of the base*

                Twister: I a=
lways be nothing but a failer with nowhere to go...

                *Twist=
er walks next to the pieces of the base sits down staring at the ground*


=
                *Blizzard frowns and a mech tear runs out of her optic*

  =
              Blizzard: I'll never have a place to stay that I can actually=
 call home.....

                *Blizzard lowers her head and sighs*

    =
              ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE=
 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturda=
y, August 05, 2000 3:10 AM
                  Subject: The End is Near......=
.....


                  Dracona looked into the pit. Plintissa wasn't mov=
ing. Dracona smiled and walked back toward her base. A dagger flew into Dra=
cona's back. She spun around and grabbed the dagger in pain. Plintissa stoo=
d there.

                  "You do not know when to give up, you fool, but=
 never mind that your an idiot, I'm going to grind you so small you won't b=
e able to be seen with a microscope!" Dracona said. She kept her hand cover=
ed and flung the dagger back. It missed Plintissa and hit Artist in the leg=
. Dracona smiled in satisfaction. Plintissa tackled Dacona and took her dow=
n. Dracona once again turned to her saw blade to saw into Plintissa. Dracon=
a fired an ice beam, but Plintissa dodged. Dracona started to burn everythi=
ng with fire beams. Plintissa still avoids it. Plintissa was always a good =
fighter, but it wasn't until now, after her bad life that she discovered he=
r true fighting power. Plintissa beat Dracona mercilessly. Draocona's parts=
 were flung everywhere as Plintissa spun a simple stick through the air. Dr=
acona raised the saw blade and sliced the stick to pieces. Dracona laughed =
and sliced Plintissa several hundred times. Plintissa fell.

              =
    "Th weak move aside and die so the strong can survive. As ancient as th=
e Cosmos, that has always been the way of things. I'm sorry Plintissa, you =
were a good friend, but don't take this personally, it's just business." Dr=
acona said.
                   
                  Dracona pulled back the s=
aw blade and thrust it towards Plintissa. Plintissa grabbed her arm from ea=
rlier and threw it. It hit Dracona's blade. Dracona slammed it into Plintis=
sa, but as she did, the blade came loose before it hit Plintissa. The blade=
 flew up. Dracona blinked her eye, the one Dinobot had scarred when she fir=
st arived on the planet. The blade sawed through Dracona and left her in pi=
eces everywhere. Her spark extinguished. Her last words were:

            =
      "*Cough, Cough* Zardus I am sorry. Plintissa, do not forget your prom=
ise." And Dracona died smiling. Plintissa remembered that she promised Drac=
ona that she would never leave her sitting. Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid=
 ran everywhere and she got weaker and weaker. Artist stepped slowly over t=
o Plintissa. He was crying, too.

                  "Artist, I'm sorry it h=
ad to end this way." Plintissa whispered.

                  "Why are you l=
eaving me, Plintissa? Why does everyone betray me?" Artist asked.

        =
          "Artist, there floats Dracona's spark, recover it, we can't part,=
 she really was my friend." Artist walked up and captured the extinguished =
spark as it tried to fly away. He contained it in a capsule.

             =
     "Plintissa, if you leave me, I'll...have no more reason to live, all m=
y friends are gone, my helping days are over." Artist said.

              =
    "Your helping days are never over, and we'll always be together." Plint=
issa said.

                  "This isn't some lame thing about how you'll =
always be in my heart, is it?"

                  "No, Artist, come here." =
Plintissa whispered. Artist looked at Team Ultima's base. It was destroyed,=
 the funny thing was, that it was destroyed by Dracona, the very one, along=
 with Plintissa, that originally built it. And there it was, sticking above=
 ground now and burning away. Sinesis looks at the base and sighs.

       =
           "Twister, Dracona is dead, I guess we have to leave." Sinesis sa=
ys. Sinister stands next to Blizzard and sighs.

                  "Blizzar=
d, we need to find another home, now." Sinister said sadly.

              =
    Artist came closer to Plintissa. Her spark suddenly burst from her and =
floated into Artist's hands. She said to him what he needed to do. He opene=
d his chest compartment and his spark was revealed. Artist combined Plintis=
sa's spark with his own, they became one.

                  "Till all are =
one." Artist whispered really low. Plintissa told him she still loved him. =
Artist was overjoyed! Plintissa was with him now, and now they could never =
be seperated again. Artist, completely ignoring Blizzard and Sinister, and =
Sinesis and Twister. ran out into a field.

                  "Artist, now =
we need to take care of Dracona's spark." Plintissa said. (Remember, only A=
rtist can hear Plintissa now) Artist headed toward the Maximal base, there =
Dracona would get a new body, one she could not attack anyone ever again in=
, and where she can always be helpful. Artist held up the contained, Dracon=
a's spark still inside.

                  "I love you." Artist said seemin=
gly to nobody.

                  "I love you too." Plintissa said to Artis=
t. Artist continued walking to the Maximal base...
